Here are the latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move:

There’s a new notifications troubleshooter to help you test if your notifications are set up right. Find it in settings.
Conversations now supports multiple inboxes. Great news if you’re associated with more than one inbox.
Click a contact’s avatar and hey presto - a faster way to open contact records.
You can now choose the currency for your revenue and deals in settings.
Thanks for using the HubSpot app.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better:

What’s new

- We now support iPhone XS, XS Max and XR.
- And, between making memojis, we’ve added support for iOS 12 too.

Bugs/fixes

- Some users were being logged out when they updated the app. This has now been fixed.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better:

What’s new

- We now support iPhone XS, XS Max and XR.
- And, between making memojis, we’ve added support for iOS 12 too.

Bugs/fixes

- Some users were being logged out when they updated the app. This has now been fixed.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better:

What’s new

- We now support iPhone XS, XS Max and XR.
- And, between making memojis, we’ve added support for iOS 12 too.

Bugs/fixes

- Some users were being logged out when they updated the app. This has now been fixed.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

** What’s new **
- Got Marketing Hub Starter? See how your emails are doing, anytime, anywhere, with the newly-added marketing email report.

** Bugs/fixes **
- Task notifications weren’t going to the right task. Fixed now, and sorry for the frustration.
- When typing an email, only the first line was visible on the screen. This has been fixed.
- Some contact and company timeline events had strayed onto associated deal timelines. They’re now back where they belong. And have promised never to go there again.

Thank you for using the HubSpot app.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

** What’s new **
- Got Marketing Hub Starter? See how your emails are doing, anytime, anywhere, with the newly-added marketing email report.

** Bugs/fixes **
- Task notifications weren’t going to the right task. Fixed now, and sorry for the frustration.
- When typing an email, only the first line was visible on the screen. This has been fixed.
- Some contact and company timeline events had strayed onto associated deal timelines. They’re now back where they belong. And have promised never to go there again.

Thank you for using the HubSpot app.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

Bugs/fixes

- We fixed an issue where the Digest screen was jumping on selection. We told it to stop jumping!
- On the Digest screen there have been cases where some text was not visible. This is now fixed.
- On the Timeline, we now display the correct tense when a call is scheduled for the future.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

Bugs/fixes

- We fixed an issue where the Digest screen was jumping on selection. We told it to stop jumping!
- On the Digest screen there have been cases where some text was not visible. This is now fixed.
- On the Timeline, we now display the correct tense when a call is scheduled for the future.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

Bugs/fixes

- We fixed an issue where the Digest screen was jumping on selection. We told it to stop jumping!
- On the Digest screen there have been cases where some text was not visible. This is now fixed.
- On the Timeline, we now display the correct tense when a call is scheduled for the future.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.
Updates
- The app was crashing for some users on opening. This has been fixed, and we’re sorry for any frustration.
- Some users had access to restricted contacts, deals or companies. Permissions are now working as they should.
- Good news. We've added multi-currency support, which means you can track deals in more than one currency.

Some under-the-hood tinkering to help you HubSpot on the move better.
Some under-the-hood tinkering to help you HubSpot on the move better.
Some under-the-hood tinkering to help you HubSpot on the move better.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

**Bugs/Fixes**
- You can import contacts with special characters (like ắ and ê) just fine.
- The app was struggling to import large numbers of contacts, but it’s all good now.
- Deals are under the right deal stages, and the deal filters are working as they should be.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

**Bugs/Fixes**
- You can import contacts with special characters (like ắ and ê) just fine.
- The app was struggling to import large numbers of contacts, but it’s all good now.
- Deals are under the right deal stages, and the deal filters are working as they should be.

The latest updates to help you HubSpot on the move better.

**Bugs/Fixes**
- You can import contacts with special characters (like ắ and ê) just fine.
- The app was struggling to import large numbers of contacts, but it’s all good now.
- Deals are under the right deal stages, and the deal filters are working as they should be.
- Design tweaks to make the sign-in and log-in experience even slicker.
- Design tweaks to make the sign-in and log-in experience even slicker.
- Design tweaks to make the sign-in and log-in experience even slicker.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

** What's new **
- The contacts list has been sped up, much faster searching and scrolling lets you work faster
- You can now call companies with HubSpot calling and leave call outcomes, keeping you organized
- Your email composer now remembers the last email address you sent from, saving you repeating yourself

** Bug fixes **
- Sometimes when importing, contacts would appear twice. They only appear once now
- Unfortunately the app was crashing sometimes. It shouldn't crash now
- Logged calls to contacts are now appearing on their company timelines, as they should
- Meetings links were sometimes not available. They are available now
- Some users were restricted access to contacts, deals or companies when they shouldn't. Permissions are now working as they should

- You can now call companies with HubSpot calling and leave call outcomes, keeping you organized
- Your email composer now remembers the last email address you sent from, saving you repeating yourself

** Bug fixes **
- Sometimes when importing, contacts would appear twice. They only appear once now
- Unfortunately the app was crashing sometimes. It shouldn't crash now
- Logged calls to contacts are now appearing on their company timelines, as they should
- Meetings links were sometimes not available. They are available now
- Some users were restricted access to contacts, deals or companies when they shouldn't. Permissions are now working as they should

** What's new **
- The contacts list has been sped up, much faster searching and scrolling lets you work faster
- You can now call companies with HubSpot calling and leave call outcomes, keeping you organized
- Your email composer now remembers the last email address you sent from, saving you repeating yourself

** Bug fixes **
- Sometimes when importing, contacts would appear twice. They only appear once now
- Unfortunately the app was crashing sometimes. It shouldn't crash now
- Logged calls to contacts are now appearing on their company timelines, as they should
- Meetings links were sometimes not available. They are available now
- Some users were restricted access to contacts, deals or companies when they shouldn't. Permissions are now working as they should

New year, new fixes:

* The app now remembers which pipeline and view you last selected on the deals board, and automatically chooses it the next time you open the app.
* If you have a multi-currency account, you can choose and edit the currency for each deal.
* All totals on the deals board are now updating as soon as a deal is modified.
* Any missing personalization tokens in template emails now have the correct labels.
* All timeline events headers are present and correct.
Plus a few under-the-hood timeline performance improvements.

And we promise there’ll be tons more improvements and cool new features coming your way in 2019.

Thanks for using the HubSpot app.

New year, new fixes:

* The app now remembers which pipeline and view you last selected on the deals board, and automatically chooses it the next time you open the app.
* If you have a multi-currency account, you can choose and edit the currency for each deal.
* All totals on the deals board are now updating as soon as a deal is modified.
* Any missing personalization tokens in template emails now have the correct labels.
* All timeline events headers are present and correct.
Plus a few under-the-hood timeline performance improvements.

And we promise there’ll be tons more improvements and cool new features coming your way in 2019.

Thanks for using the HubSpot app.

New year, new fixes:

* The app now remembers which pipeline and view you last selected on the deals board, and automatically chooses it the next time you open the app.
* If you have a multi-currency account, you can choose and edit the currency for each deal.
* All totals on the deals board are now updating as soon as a deal is modified.
* Any missing personalization tokens in template emails now have the correct labels.
* All timeline events headers are present and correct.
Plus a few under-the-hood timeline performance improvements.

And we promise there’ll be tons more improvements and cool new features coming your way in 2019.

Thanks for using the HubSpot app.

Exciting new feature alert

Conversations is now mobile. Which means you can live chat with website visitors - answering their queries and converting new leads - from anywhere. Once the chat widget is on your website (free with the HubSpot CRM, and simple to add), you can:
- Get notified whenever a new live chat lands.
- See and reply to chats in your Conversations inbox.
- Set yourself to away.
- Do other cool things we don’t have space to list here.

All from the comfort of your mobile phone.

Two new exciting updates to the app:
* You can now login with Single Sign On (SSO). This is a great way for your business to stay secure and unify credentials across systems.
* We have given the app a new lick of paint. Hope you like it!
